job.title: Supervising Registered Nurse II (CVSP)
job.description: <p><strong>Supervising Registered Nurse II</strong></p><p><strong>$124,332 - $155,640</strong> annual salary</p><p><br></p><p>Do you want a stable job that comes with all of the benefits of State employment? California Correctional Health Care Services (CCHCS) is seeking experienced and skilled CA-licensed Nurse Managers who are ready to be part of a multidisciplinary team dedicated to providing quality primary medical care.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>In this key role you will:</p><ul><li>Plan and evaluate the objectives and effectiveness of statewide programs/initiatives, including the Whole Person Care Program, Substance Use Disorder Treatment, and Hepatitis C and HIV Treatment</li><li>Plan, assign, supervise, and evaluate the work of program nursing staff, social services, and administrative support staff</li><li>Complete audits, ensuring proper documentation of patient care activities and participate in ongoing quality management/improvement efforts</li></ul><p><br></p><p>To thrive in this role, you must possess three years of registered nursing experience within the last five years, one year of which must have been in a supervisory capacity, and two years of which must have been in a general acute care hospital. (Possession of a Bachelor of Science Degree in Nursing or a Master's Degree in Nursing may be substituted for one year of general acute care hospital experience.)</p><p><br></p><p>In return for your efforts, CCHCS offers a comprehensive benefits package, including:</p><ul><li>Bonus for those new to State Service</li><li>Generous paid time off and holiday schedule</li><li>State of California retirement that vests in 5 years (visit www.CalPERS.ca.gov for retirement formulas)</li><li>Robust 401(k) and 457 savings plans (tax defer up to $39,000 - $52,000 per year)</li><li>A variety of medical, dental, and vision insurance options</li><li>And much more</li></ul><p><br></p><p>We currently have opportunities at Chuckawalla Valley State Prison (CVSP), located in Blythe.</p><p><br></p><p>Take the first step toward joining this team and apply online!</p><p><br></p><p>EOE.</p>
